articles.author: Sneha Kulkarni
articles.title: Equitas Small Finance Bank revises FD interest rates
articles.description: Equitas Small Finance Bank has increased the interest rate on fixed deposits of less than Rs 2 crore. The increased interest rates will go into effect on June 27, 2022.
articles.content:
Equitas Small Finance Bank has raised interest rates on fixed deposits under Rs 2 crore. The new interest rates are effective from June 27, 2022.

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Sindhu, Prannoy lead India's challenge at Malaysia Open Super 750
articles.description: PV Sindhu will look to quickly recover from her first-round exit at Indonesia, while HS Prannoy will eye another consistent show as the duo spearhead the Indian challenge at the Malaysia Open Super 750 tournament starting on Tuesday.

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Money laundering case: Delhi Health Minister Satyendar Jain's judicial custody extended
articles.description: The ED had arrestedDelhi health minister Satyendar Jain, 57, on May 30 in an alleged money laundering case under criminal sections of the Prevention of Money Laundering Act (PMLA). He was admitted to a city hospital last week after his oxygen level dipped.
articles.content: A court here on Monday extended by two weeks the judicial custody of Delhi health minister Satyendar Jain, arrested by the ED in a money laundering case. Special Judge Geetanjli Goel passed the order… [+838 chars]
